mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_account_info (user_id, username, phone, email, company, product, classify, alias, description, rel_id, creator, create_time, updater, last_modify_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_account_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product = #{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify = #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rel_id = #{relId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, username, phone, email, company, product, classify, alias, description, rel_id, creator, create_time, updater, last_modify_time from t_account_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, username, phone, email, company, product, classify, alias, description, rel_id, creator, create_time, updater, last_modify_time from t_account_info
select count(1) from t_account_info where user_id = #{userId}
